course_description: This course is a systematic and empirical journey through the economic, political and governance landscapes of Europe, Middle East and North Africa through a comparative assessment of the evolution of state institutions and markets.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2652, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 4-5:15p, Instructor: S. Cherribi, Status: Closed
